description: This Kotlin source file defines the ProfileFragment class for an Android app. The class manages the user profile interface, displaying user email, providing logout functionality, and setting notification reminder times with a time picker dialog.

classes.name: ProfileFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays user profile info, handles logout, and sets notification reminders.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout, initializes UI components, sets up click listeners for logout and reminder setting, and binds reminder text.

methods.name: bindReminderText
methods.description: Retrieves the reminder time and updates the UI TextView with the formatted time.
